Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Paramount - A Times Square, New York Hotel, you'll be centrally located in New York, steps from The Majestic Theater and Minskoff Theater. This 4-star hotel is close to Broadway and Times Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 597 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services. This Art Deco hotel also features gift shops/newsstands, a fireplace in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), limo/town car service, and express check-in. This hotel has 4 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers.

With a stay at The Paramount - A Times Square, New York Hotel, you'll be centrally located in New York, steps from The Majestic Theater and Minskoff Theater. This 4-star hotel is close to Broadway and Times Square.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Majestic Theater - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Minskoff Theater - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Broadway - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Toys 'R' Us Times Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Madame Tussauds Wax Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Times Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Circle in the Square Theater - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
New Amsterdam Theater - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Port Authority Bus Terminal - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Gershwin Theater - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
August Wilson Theater - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Roseland Ballroom - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
International Center of Photography - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Broadway Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Radio City Music Hall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 17.8 km / 11 mi

The preferred airport for The Paramount - A Times Square, New York Hotel is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Paramount Hotel Times Square New York are:
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 17.8 km / 11.1 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 21.4 km / 13.3 mi

The preferred airport for Paramount Hotel Times Square New York is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
***INFO BREAKFAST*** There is not restaurant facilities at the hotel, therefore, guests are given vouchers to a designated restaurant/coffee shop for Continental breakfast which includes, pastry, hot drink and a fruit. TAKE AWAY BREAKFAST. ***INFO DESAYUNO*** No hay restaurante en el hotel, sin embargo, los clientes recibir n un bono para ir a un restarurante/caf cercano para disfrutar de un desayuno Continental que incluye: una pasta,una bebida caliente y una fruta. DESAYUNO PARA LLEVAR

******MANDATORY FACILITY FEE $25+TAX ($29.42)PER ROOM PER NIGHT WILL BE DIRECT PAYMENT AT THE HOTEL // FACILITY FEE OBLIGATORIA DE $25+TAX ($29.42) POR HABITACION Y POR NOCHE SERA PAGO DIRECTO EN EL HOTEL

OCCUPANCY TAX INCLUDED IN THE RATE // OCCUPANCY TAX INCLUIDA EN LA TARIFA

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
